title: Laying it on the line
creator_credit: R and R Productions, Victorian Film Corporation and Ron V. Brown
brief_description: Gives a general overview of the method of planning excavation, laying and testing of two types of drainage materials - stoneware and PVC pipes. The need for correct installation methods current with present procedures are clearly shown.
creator_credit_for_label: R and R Productions, Victorian Film Corporation and Ron V. Brown
